Summary of open CF Metadata Trac tickets

Table columns:
  • Ticket - ticket number
  • Summary - description of ticket
  • Type - type of ticket
  • Proposer (Moderator) - the ticket's proposer (and moderator, if it has one)
  • Opened - time since the ticket was opened
  • Activity - time since activity on the ticket

Opened and Activity times are relative to 19th July 2012.

Key to status colours:

  • Green - Accepted for inclusion in next version of CF or Fix to CF checker has been committed
  • Blue - Ticket proposed for acceptance within the last three weeks
  • Yellow - Discussion in active progress (i.e. active within the last three weeks)
  • Red - Discussion has gone dormant (i.e. inactive within the last three weeks)
